results.title: Titsiana Booberini
results.creator_credit: Robert Luketic and VCA Film and Television School, University of Melbourne
results.brief_description: Internationally acclaimed musical story starring Tania Lacy as the ugly duckling check-out chick with a facial hair problem and Sophie Lee as the supermarket bully. This graduating film was so successful at film festivals around the world that its director was courted by Hollywood and went on to direct the box office hit ‘Legally Blonde’ (2001).

results.title: Sex rules
results.brief_description:
Jo and Nik are best friends until they start having to contend with boys and sex. When Jo finds out that her favourite teacher has AIDS, she becomes obsessed with the subject and bases her school artwork on the theme of safe sex. At the same time Nik is becoming involved with a boy and decides to have sex with him without a condom.
Cast features Kirsty McGregor as Jo and Angelica Klages as Nik.

results.title: Round up
results.brief_description: Round Up follows the journey of two country boys who find themselves out of place in the hustle and bustle of the big city. Here in this unfamiliar environment, they may learn that they are not as different as they first thought.

results.title: Rabbit on the moon
results.brief_description: The subject of this amusing and touching story is a young cheeky Italian girl growing up in the Australian suburbs of the 70’s, confused by the conflicting values of her classmates and those of her Italian family. She wonders about her relatives in Italy, acts as her parents’ interpreter and battles with being called a wog at school. Feeling like an outsider, she seeks solace in her pet rabbit until the rabbit meets an untimely death.

results.title: The Pursuit of happiness
results.brief_description: Young sales hopefuls Tony and Mary introduce us to self-proclaimed success story Danny, the manager of a door-to-door distribution company. His business philosophy inspires a cult like zeal in his sales team, who battle the hurdles of the working day. Danny is a model and mentor, but is his belief in greed enough? The Pursuit of happiness offers great comic relief in its view of a world where the only measure of success is winning the daily dash for cash.

results.title: Puppenhead
results.brief_description: A Berlin puppet maker named Goethe takes his clockwork puppet knife-throwing act to New York. It is 1934 and a Nazi spy is watching him. A wickedly funny black comedy that quotes from Metropolis and Caligari, this short animation captures what was so good in German Expressionism- that eerie feeling of a world out of whack.

results.title: Picture start
results.brief_description: Making a film is only half the battle. Screening it is the other half, especially when there is a resistance from an unexpected quarter, eighth, sixteenth. The result is an amusing struggle with a particularly mischievous film leader. This engaging piece of genuine animation blends both computer generated and cell drawn material.

results.title: Nightride
results.creator_credit: Martin Murphy, Della Churchill and AFTRS
results.brief_description: A masked killer, a series of brutal murders, a confined space, a resourceful young hero and a terrifying confrontation. Nightride cleverly condenses the conventions of the horror film established in Halloween and Friday the 13th into a suspenseful 11 minute film.
